forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Watching a potential winter storm. Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low around 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Watching a potential winter storm. Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 32F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Watching a potential winter storm. Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Watching a potential winter storm. Cloudy with showers. High 39F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low -4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low near 25F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 32F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain developing later in the day. High 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening mixing with and changing to steady snow overnight. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening changing over to snow overnight. Low 29F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Peeks of sunshine later. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High near 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low near 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening with precipitation turning to a mixture of rain and snow overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening with precipitation turning to a mixture of rain and snow overnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
